topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5400d5526368721a51b70100#post_5400d5526368721a51b70100


"@Shadow_the_Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5400d5b66368726dd7730000#post_5400d5b66368726dd7730000

I was in the Tomodachi Life community and posted a picture of my gay couple and their child. Didn't mention anything about them being gay, just noted how apathetic their baby looked. I get a comment that says "I'm in college and I know that this is wrong". Now already I know this kid can't be in college; college students don't start off sentences with "I'm in college" on the internet because it's stupid. So I ask her what's wrong with same sex couples, and while waiting for her response I check the kid's profile. Swear to god, it looks something like this:

"My name is Catherine and I'm ten years old, going into 5th grade!! Give me a free hug!!" 

Her posts are about her going to college, moving to Hawaii "for the rest of her life!!", and her boyfriend. 

She later responds with "when you're older you'll understand". So I told her what I read on her profile, told her she wasn't in college and said that I hope that SHE would understand when she was "older".

Little brat reported me for bullying, and when I protested I was handed a ban.
